example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VC 是) (PP-PRD (P 因为) (IP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 农村)) (VP (VV 贫无立锥))) (PU ，) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 农民)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不得不)) (VP (VP (VV 寄居) (PP (P 在) (NP (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 富裕))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 都市))) (NP (NN 底层))))) (VP (VV 讨生活))))))))))
